sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PasswordPolicy_Custom</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This script include can be referred from password policy and will be executed in change password flow..</description>
        <name>PasswordPolicy_Custom</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");
var PasswordPolicy_Custom = Class.create();
PasswordPolicy_Custom.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.customOptions = {
            minimun_password_length: 8,
            maximum_password_length: 40,
            minimum_uppercase_characters: 1,
            minimum_lowercase_characters: 1,
            minimum_numeric_characters: 1,
            minimum_special_characters: 0
        };
    },
    process: function() {
        // WRITE YOUR CODE TO CHANGE customOptions
        return this.isCustomOptionsValid() ? this.customOptions : {};
    },
    // DO NOT MODIFY THIS VALIDATION METHOD
    isCustomOptionsValid: function() {
        if (this.customOptions && Object.keys(this.customOptions).length > 0) {
            for (x in this.customOptions) {
                if (isNaN(this.customOptions[x])) {
                    gs.addErrorMessage(x + " is not a number = " + this.customOptions[x]);
                    return false;
                }
            }
        }
        return true;
    },
    type: 'PasswordPolicy_Custom'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-01-30 12:35:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8c64675b7322001099792f163cf6a74c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PasswordPolicy_Custom</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Password Policy" source="com.glide.password_policy">67fd380f6d2220100acb70b353433030</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8c64675b7322001099792f163cf6a74c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-01-30 12:35:37</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1089</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
